Battle Mage

Battle Mage is a ranged combat class, capable of dealing damage with fire and ice magic. Uses nanoparticles to use abilities

Bio

Anna appeared as a result of the mixing of two races from the planet Gulduar, where combat magic is practiced.

Specialization
